content.desc: A man killed in a paragliding crash on Mount Maunganui in Tauranga lived locally and died doing what he loved, a man who knew him says. Senior Sergeant ...

content.desc: A paraglider has died after a crash near the summit of Mt Maunganui. Emergency services were alerted to the crash at 6.20pm this evening and an emergency ...

content.title: Watch hang glider hold on for dear life - CNN
content.desc: After realizing he was not strapped in while hang gliding in Switzerland, American Chris Gursky held on for nearly four minutes while the pilot navigated to a safe landing. ©2018 Cable News Network, Inc. A WarnerMedia Company. All Rights Reserved.
